text: Innelmel mu’minunellezine amenu billahi ve resulihi ve iza kanu meahu ala emrin camiın lem yezhebu hatta yeste’zinuh(yeste’zinuhu), innellezine yeste’zinuneke ulaikellezine yu’minune billahi ve resulih(resulihi), fe izeste’zenuke li ba’dı se’nihim fe’zen li men si’te minhum vestagfir lehumullah(lehumullahe), innallahe gafurun rahim(rahimun)
